title: Ticket #4434: Arguments to remote_gahp aren't handled properly
description:
The remote_gahp script used by BOSCO for remote batch submissions supports several optional command line arguments to override the default settings for ssh credentials and the remote environment. There are a couple problems with using these arguments in the grid_resource attribute of a submit file.

  • The ssh credential arguments are ignored when remote_gahp invokes the helper script bosco_ssh_start.
  • The condor_gridmanager puts the arguments of remote_gahp in an unsupported order.

2014-Jul-16 15:19:27 by jfrey:
Marco, I've fixed the gridmanager so that the name of the remote gahp binary (batch_gahp or condor_ft-gahp) is the last argument to remote_gahp. That should simplify the code in remote_gahp.

2014-Jul-17 00:04:53 by marco:
We are using the patch successfully both with condor 8.0.6 and 8.2.1. It would be great if these can be included in 8.2.2. The problems we are having are not connected to these patches.

remote_gahp may require some changes if you change the position of the remote gahp binary.

Adding the name of the remote gahp binary at the end can simplify the remote_gahp script, even it it seems to be designed to support parameters for itself (before the host name) and parameters for the remote gahp binary (after the host name). Since batch_gahp or condor_ft-gahp seem to take no parameters there should be no problem.

2014-Jul-18 11:28:01 by marco:
Jaime, my suggestion would be to use the option --rgahp-script REMOTE_CMD (batch_gahp or condor_ft-gahp) and add them right at the beginning as first 2 parameters. This would be unambiguous.

Anyway I just pushed a new version of remote_gahp that works in all cases:

  1. REMOTE_CMD as $2, like in HTCondor <= 8.2.1
  2. REMOTE_CMD at the end like you mentioned in this ticket
  3. REMOTE_CMD after the user@hostname
  4. REMOTE_CMD added using option --rgahp-script REMOTE_CMD

Options 1 and 2 are treated in a section marked WORKAROUND SECTION that is safe to remove in future HTCondor versions if only 3 and 4 happen.

Please use this version for the next HTCondor release (committed today): https://github.com/mambelli/htcondor/blob/v8_2-bosco/src/condor_gridmanager/remote_gahp

2014-Jul-18 14:00:21 by jfrey:
